name: Skills Bus Driving Lever
description:
Skills Bus Driving Lever!!!!
Crazy challenging levels and a lot of fun are waiting for you in the city adventure. Driving a party bus in the city adventure is very difficult task. Show your driving skills and park the turbo bus in the parking lot within a limited time. Get the experience of real driving with a city bus. Drive your coach on an impossible track in the city environment. You will not play such type of game as yet. To complete all the levels you have to become a driving master. You can change the angle of your camera by simply touching your screen. The background music will give you an amazing feeling of driving.
Features:
• Awesome graphics
• Realistic sound system
• Different buses
• Exciting stages
• Interesting game play
